Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2019 01:21AM Sactolady wrote: I had a double mastectomy in August of 2018 and now belong to a Facebook support group called "Flat and Fabulous". Maybe you already belong to it. It is a closed group that you can join to help with surgery decisions, a list of surgeons, questions to ask, going through surgery, & post-surgery advice. The female-to-male surgery is different than a BMX and this has been discussed in the group, too. The ladies are very supportive of each other. I have the book "Flat" too, if you would like to read it. I can mail it free to you. Best wishes to you, Alison
Posts.Title: Going Flat: Choosing a surgeon CJB71 Q4life
